label: 橘在列
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?-?953). Teacher of Minamoto no Shitagau. Became a monk in 944. Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(7), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (9), Sakumon daitai (1). [源順、漢詩、作文大体]
